name: @eclipse-zenoh/zenoh-ts
description: Zenoh: The Zero Overhead Pub/Sub/Query Protocol

scripts.wasm: cd ../zenoh-keyexpr-wasm && cargo install wasm-pack && wasm-pack build --target bundler --out-dir ../zenoh-ts/src/key_expr
scripts.build: npm run wasm && npm run compile
scripts.clean: rm -rf ./node_modules ./dist ./esm && (cd examples/deno && yarn clean) && (cd examples/chat && yarn clean)
scripts._build: sh -c '[ ! -d "node_modules" ] || [ ! -d "dist" ] && yarn clean && yarn install && yarn build || true'
scripts.start: sh -c '[ -z "$0" ] || [ ! -d "examples/$0" ] && echo "Available examples:" && ls -d examples/*/ | sed -e "s/examples\///" -e "s/\///" || (yarn _build && cd examples/$0 && yarn start "$@")'

author: Charles Schleich
